This option is only for testing. If you change this value to higher, the app could take longer time mining the hashes, your device will use more CPU and it could be frozen. If this happens, close the app and try to clear the storage data to restore the values.

 Note: The app will be restarted to apply the change. I understood. Continue and restart Developed by Edgar Garcia v.1.0.0 - Build 01 This app is an example to learn how Blockchain works as an Android app using Java. To know more about Blockchain you can visit: Blockchain tutorial Bitcoin White Paper Or read: Blockchain Revolution The Science of the Blockchain You can find the source code of this app at: GitHub Medium post More about me: Visit my web site <3 Thanks a lot!
